channel.title: World
channel.description: The Washington Post World section provides information and analysis of breaking world news stories. In addition to our world news and video, Post World News offers discussions and blogs on major international news and economic issues.

item.title: New Zealand navy ship sinks, prompting environmental concerns
item.dc:creator: Rachel Pannett, Kelsey Baker
item.description: An oil spill is highly likely, said local authorities, after the New Zealand Navy ship HMNZS Manawanui sank near Samoa.
